FLOOR_PLANS.NAME: Name
FLOOR_PLANS.CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure to delete the floor plan?
FLOOR_PLANS.IMAGE.HINT:
You can upload floor plan image in PNG or JPEG format.
Optimal Settings:
Format: PNG
Size: 1200+ px
Aspect Ratio: variable
Background: transparent or white
FLOOR_PLANS.POINT.HINT.SELECT: Select point on floor plan for details.
FLOOR_PLANS.POINT.HINT.CREATE: Click on floor plan to create a new point.
FLOOR_PLANS.EMBEDDING.HINT: Use the following code to embed the floor plan to your website. Copy/paste the code to your HTML page.
